projects.title: Whole Life Church (VR Experience)
projects.description: My partner and I at Cyber Sun Studio recreated this church in Florida from a bunch of pictures sent to us. This project was used to help bridge the gap between in-person church and VR church!

projects.title: Lakeland Church (VR Experience)
projects.description: The building interior as well as the furniture were all modeled by myself and my partner for our company Cyber Sun Studio!

services.title: Product Rendering
services.description: I create a 3D model of products from the physical object or solely pictures. The product can then be animated and shown in any setting or lighting you'd choose. I will combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualizations that bring your project to life. Perfect for a commercial or banner for your website.

services.title: Environment Art
services.description: I will design a scene for a render or an area for a game or interactive project. The scene includes full physically based rendering materials and 3D models for use in everything from a short film to a video game in a photo-realistic or simple low-poly style.

services.title: VR Optimized Art
services.description: I will create any art and by using the best optimization  and baking techniques, ensure that the model will run optimally in Virtual/Augmented Reality projects and look its best at the same time.

services.title: Asset Modeling
services.description: I can model any single high detail asset that may be used for games, film or any other sort of entertainment. This would be something like special weapon or object in a video game or movie.

services.title: Game Art
services.description: I can create any model, large or small, high or low detail and optimize it for game engine use. I have background in game development so I understand the importance of optimizing models, as well as the best practices to do so.

services.title: Interior Rendering
services.description: I can create a model of your floor plan layout with, if needed, custom models for certain or all the furniture, depending on the level of realism needed. I can also add photo-realistic materials with advanced lighting and shading effects for the most compelling and life-like result.

services.title: Architectural Rendering
services.description: I can make and render a full architectural model. This would include the land topology, the home structure, the driveway, the sun position, and anything else you might want to include to make the render as realistic and convincing as possible.

services.title: VR Integration
services.description: I can add any interior or architectural scene that I create into a Virtual Reality space for you. Experiencing your space in a VR headset can help you immerse yourself and bring a more profound connection to the space. It can help convey a more accurate feeling of the size and flow and will help you better understand how it'll feel to stand in it in real life.

aboutpara: My name is Nigel Cameron McKenzie-Dingle. My passions are 3D Art, Game Development and being creative in general. I love creating experiences that impact individuals positively in mediums from Virtual Reality to real life products and in ways that combine mesmerizing art and cutting-edge technology. I want anything I create to be beneficial to someone in someway and therefore I love working with individuals or companies, big or small to help bring whatever you want to create to life. I do what I love to do and I put my passion and love into every project I do regardless of if it's my own, or just a contract. I want to put impactful creations into the world in the hopes that any person, group or company can grow in some way from it. All the best, - Nigel

resume.tagline: 👋  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
